backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, plans, permissions, and audio file storage with admin/user access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking admin plan spoofing behavior to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH color variables with light/dark theme definitions and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the React root with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup with user/admin route guards, loading skeletons, and routes for core app pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Admin navigation sidebar with links to dashboard, user management, audio library, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing a neon-grid background and page container.
Audio upload form with validation, progress tracking, and integration with the audio library mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Handles user and admin login flows using Internet Identity, manages modal state, errors, and redirects after authentication.
Displays a grid of feature cards describing the application's AI music tools and capabilities.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with login/logout controls, admin session handling, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/MyAudioList.tsx: Shows the user's audio files with playback, deletion, and navigation to the Mix & Master tool.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays subscription plans with pricing details and triggers authentication when selecting a plan.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to save an initial profile by entering a name and submitting to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ToolLauncher.tsx: Displays available music tools, checks plan-based access, and handles navigation or upgrade prompts.
Shows available plan upgrades, handles upgrade actions, and displays admin or full-plan states.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Renders an admin table for viewing users and updating their plans with inline editing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication, auto-refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminData.ts: Provides hooks for fetching admin stats, all users with profiles, and updating user plans.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Implements a simple admin session system with password validation and sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLibrary.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and deleting the caller's audio files via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to load and update the caller's user profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useExportUsage.ts: Tracks export usage, bypassing backend calls for admins and refreshing profile data on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state and loading identities with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlan.ts: Defines a mutation hook to update the caller's user plan and remaining exports, invalidating profile queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including color tokens and a glass panel component style.
frontend/src/lib/audioProcessing.ts: Implements audio processing with EQ and gain using OfflineAudioContext and provides WAV download utilities.
frontend/src/lib/planUtils.ts: Utility functions for mapping plan types to display names and determining effective plans during admin sessions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page that requires admin and Internet Identity auth, displays stats and users, and auto-refreshes data.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, pricing sections, and authentication modal handling.
frontend/src/pages/MixMasterPage.tsx: Audio mixing page that loads a selected file, sets up Web Audio nodes, and provides EQ, gain, and playback controls with export support.
frontend/src/pages/MyAudioPage.tsx: User audio library page handling authentication, file uploads, and listing stored audio files.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard displaying user profile, plan status, and tools, redirecting unauthenticated users to the homepage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the platformâ€™s current state, goals, architecture notes, issues, and a list of existing implemented features. It outlines required functionality for authentication, admin access, dashboards, and UI behavior.
